title: One Piece with a Lime - Episodes 418-421
author: One Piece with a Lime
description: Podcast coverage of One Piece episodes 418-421, discussing the Straw Hats' whereabouts after being separated by Kuma, including Zoro's arrival on Kuraigana Island and Brook landing on Namakura Island.

title: One Piece – Amazon Lily Arc (Episodes 406 – 421) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: Comprehensive review of the Amazon Lily Arc covering episodes 406-421, including analysis of the finale episode where the Straw Hats' locations are revealed and preparations begin for the Marineford War.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for Amazon Lily Arc (episodes 406-421)

description: Uncut reaction video for One Piece Episode 421 by BOLDcast, available to Patreon supporters.

title: Zoro Screaming Compilation | One Piece Episode 421
author: @itmorph
description: TikTok compilation of Zoro screaming in episode 421, particularly the scene where Perona's Negative Hollow affects him and he screams into his eyecatcher.

title: One Piece Episode 421: Zoro and Luffy's Amazon Lily
author: @zorovcp
description: TikTok video about episode 421 featuring Zoro's situation on Kuraigana Island and Luffy's final moments in the Amazon Lily arc.

title: Garp and Ace Encounter in One Piece Episode 421
